question: Which state government has launched a smartphone distribution scheme 'Mobile Tihar' under the Sanchar Kranti Yojna (SKY)?
explanation: The Chhattisgarh government has launched a smartphone distribution scheme \'Mobile Tihar\' under the Sanchar Kranti Yojna (SKY). The scheme is for distribution of smartphones to women and students, covering over 50 Lakh beneficiaries. As part of the scheme, 556 new mobile towers will be installed across the state. \'Mobile Tihar\' was launched by Chhattisgarh Chief Minister Raman Singh, along with National Award-winning actress Kangana Ranaut on July 31.
